Wonky Sprout OS

THE WONKY SPROUT MANIFESTO

Structure Engineered for Chaos

I. THE DIAGNOSIS (WHAT‚ÄôS BROKEN)

I am a 40-year-old man diagnosed with Autism Spectrum Disorder (ASD) and ADHD in 2024. For 15 years, I was a Navy Systems Diagnostician‚Äîmy job was to find the root cause of system failures, not patch holes.

When I turned that diagnostic lens on my own life, the pattern became clear:

The Problem: Neurodivergent brains process the world differently. Sensory input is overwhelming. Executive function is unreliable. Transitions are painful. Organization is chaos.

The Typical ‚ÄúSolution‚Äù: Generic productivity advice built for neurotypical brains. ‚ÄúJust try harder.‚Äù ‚ÄúBe more organized.‚Äù ‚ÄúManage your time better.‚Äù

The Result: System failure. Burnout. Shame spirals. More chaos.

II. THE SHIFT (REFRAMING THE INPUT)

I became a father to two kids. I became a co-parent navigating custody schedules. The chaos increased exponentially.

The Realization: My brain is not broken. It‚Äôs a high-performance engine optimized for pattern recognition, hyper-focus, and systems-level thinking. The chaos is not my fault‚Äîit‚Äôs the external load the system must handle.

The Engineering Question: What if I stopped trying to ‚Äúfix‚Äù my brain and instead built structure to absorb the chaos?

This is the shift from self-blame to systems design.

III. THE STRUCTURE (THE ENGINEERING SOLUTION)

The Dual-Mode Protocol

Life is not one continuous state. It alternates between two distinct operating modes:

MODE 1: SOLO EXECUTION (Mon 6PM ‚Üí Fri 4PM)

  • Purpose: Deep work, system building, high-output engineering
  • Structure: 7-hour focus blocks, minimal distractions, Bubble Shield protocols
  • Output: SOPs, digital systems, content creation
  • Energy: Recharge through solitude and structured work

MODE 2: FAMILY STRUCTURE (Fri 4PM ‚Üí Mon 6PM)

  • Purpose: High-vigilance parenting, structured family time
  • Structure: Hourly schedules, visual timers, sensory breaks
  • Output: Quality time, co-parenting coordination, kids‚Äô protocols
  • Energy: Drain through social engagement, replenish through routine

The Fix: By separating these modes and designing protocols for each, the system can handle both without failure.

The Foundational Daily Protocols (The Non-Negotiables)

These 5 protocols run every single day, regardless of mode:

  1. Water Protocol - 32oz before coffee (prevents dehydration-induced dysfunction)
  2. Pill Protocol - Medication at 6:00 AM sharp (chemical baseline stability)
  3. Chaos Capture Protocol - Audio recorder + Google Keep (external brain storage)
  4. Sleep Fence Protocol - 10:30 PM screen shutdown (circadian protection)
  5. Daily Dump Protocol - 5-minute brain export to text file (cognitive reset)

The Engineering Principle: You cannot optimize #7 (Work) if #1-4 (Sleep, Food, Water, Medicine) are failing. Priority hierarchy is non-negotiable.

The Bubble Shield (Sensory Fortress)

Problem: Open-office noise, unpredictable sound, sensory chaos = system overload.

Solution: Soundcore Space One headphones with dual-profile setup:

  • Profile 1.0 (Deep Work): Maximum ANC, no awareness mode, total isolation
  • Profile 2.0 (Awareness): 50% ANC, voice passthrough, partial shield

Implementation: Physical object = protocol trigger. Put on headphones ‚Üí brain enters focus state.

IV. THE BLUEPRINT (THE DIGITAL SYSTEM)

This website is the externalized operating system for my life. It is not a blog. It is a public SOP vault.

The 4 Modules (M1-M4)

M1: MEDIA/BRAND

  • Purpose: Public-facing identity, content creation, personal brand
  • Output: Blog posts, brand guide, manifesto, visual assets
  • Audience: Neurodivergent adults, co-parents, systems thinkers

M2: PRODUCTS

  • Purpose: Monetizable digital products (future revenue stream)
  • Output: SOP templates, Notion databases, automation scripts
  • Status: Planned (not yet active)

M3: SERVICE

  • Purpose: 1-on-1 systems consulting, co-parenting coaching
  • Output: Custom protocols, organization systems, remote setup
  • Status: Planned (not yet active)

M4: PERSONAL OS

  • Purpose: Internal life management system
  • Output: Daily protocols, mode-specific SOPs, personal trackers
  • Audience: Me (primary), family (shared protocols)

The File Naming Convention (Structure Enforced)

Every file follows this pattern:

YYYY-MM-DD_MODULE_TYPE_description.md

Example: 2025-11-09_M1_PAGE_manifesto-v2.md

Why This Works: Chronological sorting, instant categorization, zero ambiguity. The file system IS the organization system.

V. THE CORE PROTOCOL (THE ‚ÄúFIX‚Äù)

My brain is a high-performance engine for organizing multi-threaded, chaotic data. It is an optimization. I am the ‚ÄúSystems Diagnostician‚Äù who spent 15 years finding the root cause. I don‚Äôt patch holes. I fix stuff.

The New Slogan: Structure Engineered for Chaos

This is the non-negotiable mission of The Wonky Sprout:

  1. I AM THE ENGINEER. The world throws unpredictable chaos (unpleasant noise, inefficient processes, emotional friction) at the system. I treat it as an external load.

  2. I PROVIDE THE STRUCTURE. I apply my systems-level hyper-focus to engineer the solution (creating SOPs, designing physical organization, building digital systems).

  3. THE RESULT IS THE BLUEPRINT. The final output is a system that can absorb the chaos without failing.

This is the definition of my brand: The ‚ÄúWonky Sprout‚Äù is not a philosophy; it is an Engineering Solution.

The Engineering Metaphor (The Core Framework)

Element Personal Brand Engineering Parallel
Input Life chaos (sensory, executive, emotional) External load on system
Processor ADHD/Autism brain (hyper-focus, pattern recognition) High-performance diagnostic engine
Output SOPs, digital systems, protocols Engineered solutions
Result Functional life structure System that absorbs chaos without failing

VI. THE ANTI-BS COMMITMENT (THE VIBE)

This brand operates under the ‚ÄúAnti-BS‚Äù framework:

What I DO:

  • ‚úÖ Provide exact steps (numbered, time-specified)
  • ‚úÖ Acknowledge executive dysfunction openly
  • ‚úÖ Build systems that work when your brain doesn‚Äôt
  • ‚úÖ Use direct language (‚ÄúThis fixes X‚Äù)
  • ‚úÖ Account for failure points in every protocol
  • ‚úÖ Design for neurodivergent users first

What I DON‚ÄôT DO:

  • ‚ùå Write motivational fluff (‚ÄúYou got this!‚Äù)
  • ‚ùå Use corporate jargon or buzzwords
  • ‚ùå Pretend systems don‚Äôt require maintenance
  • ‚ùå Create ‚Äúinspiration‚Äù without action
  • ‚ùå Assume neurotypical workflow patterns
  • ‚ùå Hide complexity with vague promises

The Voice: ‚ÄúManly, still soft.‚Äù I fix stuff. Direct, authentic, systems-oriented.

VII. THE MISSION (THE OUTPUT)

For Neurodivergent Adults:

Build and share protocols that transform chaos into structure. Provide the SOPs that no one else writes because they assume you ‚Äúshould just know‚Äù how to do things.

For Co-Parents:

Create shared systems that eliminate the ‚Äúwho has the kids when?‚Äù confusion. Visual schedules, protocol handoffs, transparent coordination.

For Systems Thinkers:

Demonstrate that neurodivergence is an optimization, not a bug. The ability to hyper-focus, pattern-match, and systematize is a superpower when channeled through proper structure.

VIII. THE DEFINITION (WHO I AM)

I am William Johnson (classicwilly). I am:

  • A 40-year-old neurodivergent father managing Autism/ADHD through engineered protocols
  • A Navy Systems Diagnostician (15 years) who finds root causes, not patches
  • A co-parent navigating dual-mode life structure (Solo Execution + Family Structure)
  • A systems architect building public SOPs for neurodivergent life management

I am not:

  • A life coach selling generic advice
  • A productivity guru with one-size-fits-all solutions
  • A motivational speaker pretending positivity solves problems
  • A ‚Äúfixed‚Äù person who ‚Äúovercame‚Äù neurodivergence

I am an engineer who built structure to absorb chaos.

IX. THE INVITATION (THE NEXT ACTION)

If you are:

  • Neurodivergent and tired of advice that doesn‚Äôt account for your brain
  • A co-parent drowning in schedule chaos
  • A systems thinker who sees patterns everywhere
  • Someone who needs exact protocols, not vague inspiration

Then this system is for you.

Explore the SOP Vault ‚Üí Find the protocol that fixes your specific problem
Check the Kids Page ‚Üí See co-parenting structure in action
Read the Brand Guide ‚Üí Understand the engineering philosophy
Use the Daily Tracker ‚Üí Implement the foundational protocols

X. THE SLOGAN (THE IDENTITY)

‚ÄúThe Wonky Sprout: Structure Engineered for Chaos.‚Äù

  • The Wonky Sprout = Brand name (organic + systematic fusion)
  • Structure = The output (SOPs, protocols, systems)
  • Engineered = The method (diagnostic, root-cause, precision)
  • For Chaos = The input (neurodivergent life, co-parenting, sensory overload)

This is not a philosophy.
This is not a journey.
This is not inspiration.

This is an engineering solution.
